shapes

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.Shape
      • shapes.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Shape
    A rectangle that appears on screen and interacts with other shapes. Many of Rectangles's useful methods are in its superclasses Shape and ConvexPolygon.

        public void setup()
        Description copied from class: Shape
        Initializes the Shape. When you subclass shape, you'll override this method to do things like set the shape's color, set its starting position, etc.

      • update

        public void update()
        Description copied from class: Shape
        Updates the shape once per frame. When you subclass shape, you'll override this method to do things like move the shape, change its size, etc.

      • setDisplaysRotation

        public void setDisplaysRotation(boolean displaysRotation)
        Set whether this shape displays the direction it is facing. When set to false, calls to Shape.setDirection(shapes.Direction) will not change the appearance of this shape, but they will still affect which direction this shape moves when Shape.move(double) is called.
        Parameters:
        displaysRotation - true to display this shape's rotation, false to hide it.
